categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A Padawan was apprenticed to the Duros Jedi Master Cei Vookto before the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. In 21.77 BBY, Vookto sacrificed himself to ensure his troops' survival during the fighting on the planet Lianna, which ended with a Republic victory. During the Duros Jedi's funeral pyre—which was attended by Masters Yoda, Mace Windu, Tholme, Quinlan Vos, and Vookto's latest Padawan, Dama Montalvo—Vookto's first Padawan was mentioned by Windu.

Cei Vookto's first Padawan's only mention, thus far, in the Star Wars canon came in the comic book Jedi: Mace Windu, which was released on February 26, 2003 and written by John Ostrander. The character received an indirect mention in the comic.
